data.name: Alpha Particle Demo
data.detailed_description:
Alpha Particle Demo Mode is a tailored version of the original version that starts you off with a few extra perks and abilities and sets you on a fully explorable space station complete with all of it's levels, boss and hidden areas.

A new particle entity life form is created but it has no clue to what it's purpose is.
data.about_the_game:
Alpha Particle Demo Mode is a tailored version of the original version that starts you off with a few extra perks and abilities and sets you on a fully explorable space station complete with all of it's levels, boss and hidden areas.

A new particle entity life form is created but it has no clue to what it's purpose is.
data.short_description: Alpha Particle is sci-fi action game about a defenceless particle that must overcome it's obstacles creatively

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual core 2ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidea 9800 or higher
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad core 3ghz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidea GTX 1060 or higher
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
